info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 06 at 2:32AM MDT until April 06 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-Freezing temperatures down to as low as 25 in many places the next few mornings. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin and Arches/Grand Flat. In Colorado, Grand Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning and from 1 AM to 9 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will impact new and sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing and irrigation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
